publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-347 Chris Ballance: Redundancy Notices at the National Library of Scotlandâ€”That the Parliament condemns the redundancy notices to six senior heads of department at the National Library of Scotland and regrets the fact that the skills of the six most knowledgeable librarians in Scotland are potentially to be lost to the nation.
S2M-347 Redundancy Notices at the National Library of Scotland (lodged on 15 September 2003) Mark Ballard*, Eleanor Scott*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-347 Redundancy Notices at the National Library of Scotland (lodged on 15 September 2003) Alex Neil*, Mike Pringle*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Robin Harper*, Dr Jean Turner*, Colin Fox*
S2M-347 Redundancy Notices at the National Library of Scotland (lodged on 15 September 2003) Mr Keith Raffan*, Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*

S2M-347 Chris Ballance: Redundancy Notices at the National Library of Scotland-That the Parliament condemns the redundancy notices to six senior heads of department at the National Library of Scotland and regrets the fact that the skills of the six most knowledgeable librarians in Scotland are potentially to be lost to the nation. Supported by: Mark Ballard, Eleanor Scott, Shiona Baird, Alex Neil, Mike Pringle, Mr Mark Ruskell, Robin Harper, Dr Jean Turner, Colin Fox, Mr Keith Raffan, Frances Curran, Carolyn Leckie, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Tommy Sheridan*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-347 Redundancy Notices at the National Library of Scotland (lodged on 15 September 2003) Christine Grahame*
S2M-347 Redundancy Notices at the National Library of Scotland (lodged on 15 September 2003) Fiona Hyslop*
